description: What could happen when you go to pick upyour car at the garage and find yourself unable to pay the bill? One thing is what young blond Mike Experiences at the mercy of macho mechanics Ed Wiley and Guillermo, who knock a few bucks off his tab by making a big investment in Mike's tight ass. Another young customer walks in on the action and settles his own account in an even heavier assault by the cocks of these two sex-hungry mechanics.Studs Wiley and his buddy indeed run a 'full-service' operation.
series: Falcon Bareback Vol 08 - Blue Collar Balling
title: Falcon Bareback Vol 08 - Blue Collar Balling
